title: so i finally made Dragon Age : Inquisition work on my pc
body:
guess all I had to do was replace Windows Vista with Windows 7 (my pc is like 8 years old xD)

Is there something important I need to know from Dragon Age 2 ? I didn't bother playing this shit game, I was like 15 minutes in it and almost puked cuz of how bad it is. Also, the terrible reviews discourage me from even bothering with it. Which is kinda sad because I love Dragon Age : Origins :(
